doc.previous: Define a new set of vectors known as orthogonal basis vectors to be those transformed by the orthogonal matrix
doc.after: Therefore every blade of grade r can be written as a geometric product of r vectors More generally if a degenerate geometric algebra is allowed then the orthogonal matrix is replaced by a block matrix that is orthogonal in the nondegenerate block and the diagonal matrix has zero valued entries along the degenerate dimensions If the new vectors of the nondegenerate subspace are normalized according to
